qas.question: Fishing, hunting, and birdwatching are what kind of activities that are provided in North Carolina?
In the Fall, people go to North Carolina to see what?
What is another name for caving?

context: North Carolina provides a large range of <a0_0>recreational<a0_0/> activities, from swimming at the beach to skiing in the mountains. North Carolina offers <a1_0>fall colors<a1_0/>, freshwater and saltwater fishing, hunting, birdwatching, agritourism, ATV trails, ballooning, rock climbing, biking, hiking, skiing, boating and sailing, camping, canoeing, caving (<a2_0>spelunking<a2_0/>), gardens, and arboretums. North Carolina has theme parks, aquariums, museums, historic sites, lighthouses, elegant theaters, concert halls, and fine dining.
